text: William Osborne "Tuck" Tucker III (August 20, 1961 â€“ December 22, 2020) was an American writer, artist, animator, songwriter, and director. He was born in Lynchburg, Virginia. He was known for having worked on SpongeBob SquarePants, The Simpsons and Hey Arnold!. Tucker died in California on December 22, 2020 at the age of 59.Director, Storyboard Artist, Writer and Animator Tuck Tucker Dies at 59 ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American animators Category:American songwriters Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:Writers from Virginia Category:People from Lynchburg, Virginia
title: Tuck Tucker
